name: Highrise (itch) (Floor Tentacles Devs)
description:
Highrise is a platformer game where you explore a abandoned city.

Choose your own way of playing Highrise: 

You can try to speedrun the game, collect all the coins, or just play and enjoy the game!

Also, this game was accidentally submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Sorry for the inconvenience, you can check out our actual submission if you would like.
